channel.title: Wow, another question. ::explock and ::expunlock
channel.description: I'm wanting to add ::explock and ::expunlock commands to my server, and since I am a fail coder, I'm not sure how I would add it. Any help?

item.title: Wow, another question. ::explock and ::expunlock
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

You need to make it so if the variable is true/false it will give/not give exp.

Read full topic

item.title: Wow, another question. ::explock and ::expunlock
item.dc:creator: @The_Disciple The Disciple
item.description:
@The_Disciple wrote:

Alright, thanks for the help. I’ll test it out, and hopefully it’ll work.

Read full topic

item.title: Wow, another question. ::explock and ::expunlock
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Under:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Add:

public boolean explock = false;

item.title: Wow, another question. ::explock and ::expunlock
item.dc:creator: @The_Disciple The Disciple
item.description:
@The_Disciple wrote:

[quote author=lesterknome link=topic=394704.msg2933547#msg2933547 date=1251416587]

[quote=“The Disciple, post:3, topic:298303”]So it would be something like:

if (command.startsWith("explock")){ explock = true; }

And

if (command.startsWith("expunlock")){ explock = false; }[/quote]Alright, after I did that and compiled, this error came up:

client.java:9206: cannot find symbol symbol : variable explock location: class client explock = true; ^ client.java:9209: cannot find symbol symbol : variable explock location: class client explock = false; ^

Read full topic

item.title: Wow, another question. ::explock and ::expunlock

item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote author=The Disciple link=topic=394704.msg2933521#msg2933521 date=1251415788]
So it would be something like:

if (command.startsWith("explock")){ explock = true; }

And

if (command.startsWith("expunlock")){ explock = false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Wow, another question. ::explock and ::expunlock
item.dc:creator: @The_Disciple The Disciple
item.description:
@The_Disciple wrote:

So it would be something like:

if (command.startsWith("explock") && playerRights > 0){ public static boolean explock = true; }

And

if (command.startsWith("expunlock") && playerRights > 0){ public static boolean explock = false; }

Did I do that right?

And also, how would I make an SGS heal your HP when you use its special?

Read full topic

item.title: Wow, another question. ::explock and ::expunlock
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The Disciple:

I’m wanting to add ::explock and ::expunlock commands to my server, and since I am a fail coder, I’m not sure how I would add it. Any help?

Change your xp rates so that they only go up when

public static boolean explock = false;

Is true. Just make that boolean, do those edits, and make the commands change it between true and false.

Read full topic
